rukus.text: hananim-i jangsuhage hasa ha nanim-i geulo hayeo dasi doedol-a ga ge hanani geulaedo geudeul-eun ihaeha ji moshaneunyo
hananim-eun yeeonja-ege sileul galeuchiji anihaess-eumyeo siin-eun geu ege jeoghabhaji anhnola igeos-eun me sejilo sasil-eul balghyeojuneun kkulan-ila
igeos-eulo sal-aissneun ideul-e ge gyeong-gohago bulsinjadeul-egeneun jin liui malsseum-i silhyeondoege hayeossnola
geudeul-eun hananim-i geudeul-eul wi hae changjohan gachugdeul-eul geudeullo hayeo geum daseulige han geos-eul alji moshagoissneunyo
hananimkkeseo geugeosdeullo hayeogeumgeudeul-ui sseu-im-e sunjongke hayeo ilbu neun geudeul-eul unbanhaneun geos-eulo hago ilbuneun sig-yong-eulo hayeossnola
geudeul-eun geugeosdeullo daleun yuyong ham-eul eodnani masil uyuleul eodnola geuleondedo geudeul-eun gamsahal jul moleu neunyo
geudeul-eun hananim anin daleun sindeul-eul sungbaehani geudeul-i doum-eul bad eul su iss-eulila gidaehaneunyo
usangdeul-eun geudeul-eul doul him-i eobs-eumyeo ohilyeo geudeul-eun usang-ui byeong salosseo bulliwo ganola
geudeul-ui mal-i geudaeleul seulpeuge haji anihalini hananim-eun geudeul-isumgineun geosgwa deuleonaeneun geos-eul asi nola
ingan-eun hananim-i geuleul jeong-aeg eulo jieusyeossdaneun geos-eul alji mosha neunyo bola geuleona geuneun ajigdo nonjaenghago issnola
ingan-eun hananimgwa yusahan geos deul-eul jieonaemyeo geuga changjodoen geos-eul ij-eobeoligo malhagil bupaehayeo beolin-i ppyeoe nuga saengmyeong-eul buyeohaneunyo lago hadeola
illeogalodoe hananimkkeseo taecho-e geudeul-eul changjohan saengmyeong-eul geudeul-e ge jusil geos-ila sillo geubun-eun modeungeos-eul changjohasim-eul algo gyesinola
neohuileul wihae puleun namueseo bul-eul bola geuttae neohuineun geugeos-eulo bul-eul balghinola
haneulgwa daejileul changjohasin geu bunkkeseo geugeosdeulgwa yusahan geos-eul chang johal su eobsdan mal-inyo geuleohji aniham-ila sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul changjohasimyeo asinola
sillo geubunkkeseo mueos-e tteus-eul dusigo iss-eola myeonglyeonghasimyeon geudaelodoenila
modeun manmul-eul jugwanhasin geubun kke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo geu modeun geos-eungeubun-egelo gwiuihanola
